from { opacity:1.0; }

}
.blinking{
	-webkit-animation-name: "pulse";
	-webkit-animation-duration: 0.8s;
	-webkit-animation-timing-function:ease-in-out;
	-webkit-animation-direction: alternate;
	-webkit-animation-delay: 0s;
	-webkit-animation-iteration-count:infinite;
}

	-webkit-animation-name: "pulse";
	-webkit-animation-duration: 0.6s;
	-webkit-animation-timing-function: ease-out;
	-webkit-animation-iteration-count: infinite;
}

@-webkit-keyframes imgblink {
    from {
        -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 4px #E3111B, inset 0px 0px 3px 1px #B20E16;
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 4px #E3111B, inset 0px 0px 3px 1px #B20E16;
    }
    to {
        -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px #E3111B, inset 0px 0px 0px 0px #B20E16;
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px #E3111B, inset 0px 0px 0px 0px #B20E16;
    }
}
@-webkit-keyframes imgblink-gold {
    from {
        -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 4px #ffe000, inset 0px 0px 3px 1px #888800;
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 4px #ffe000, inset 0px 0px 3px 1px #888800;
    }
    to {
        -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px #fffc00, inset 0px 0px 0px 0px #888800;
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px #fffc00, inset 0px 0px 0px 0px #888800;
    }
}

    from {
        -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 4px #0000ff, inset 0px 0px 3px 1px #000066;
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 4px #0000ff, inset 0px 0px 3px 1px #000066;
    }

    }
}

#status-bg-m {
background: rgb(0,255,255,0.4); /* Old browsers */
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, 
rgba(0,255,255,0.4) 0%, 
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 30%, 
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 70%, 
rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, 
color-stop(0%,rgba(0,255,255,0.41)), 
color-stop(30%,rgba(0,0,158,0.41)), 
color-stop(70%,rgba(0,0,158,0.41)), 
color-stop(100%,rgba(0,255,255,0.41))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, 
rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 0%,
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 30%,
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 70%,
rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
background: -o-linear-gradient(top, 
rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 0%,
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 30%,
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 70%,
rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 0%,rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 30%,rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 70%,rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 100%); /* IE10+ */
background: linear-gradient(to bottom, 
rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 0%,
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 30%,
rgba(0,0,158,0.41) 70%,
rgba(0,255,255,0.41) 100%); /* W3C */
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#00ffff', endColorstr='#00ffff',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */
}
#info-base {
	width: 100%;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 0%, rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 5%, rgba(99,99,99,0.4) 45%, rgba(153,153,153,0.4) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,rgba(51,51,51,0.4)), color-stop(5%,rgba(51,51,51,0.4)), color-stop(45%,rgba(99,99,99,0.4)), color-stop(100%,rgba(153,153,153,0.4))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 0%,rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 5%,rgba(99,99,99,0.4) 45%,rgba(153,153,153,0.4) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 0%,rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 5%,rgba(99,99,99,0.4) 45%,rgba(153,153,153,0.4) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 0%,rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 5%,rgba(99,99,99,0.4) 45%,rgba(153,153,153,0.4) 100%); /* IE10+ */
background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 0%,rgba(51,51,51,0.4) 5%,rgba(99,99,99,0.4) 45%,rgba(153,153,153,0.4) 100%); /* W3C */
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#66333333', endColorstr='#66999999',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */
}

    left: 0;
	text-align:right;
}

    width:90%;
    color: #333333;
}

    text-align:center;
	cursor:pointer;

.btn-bg {
	padding:2% 3%;
	background: rgb(234,218,184); /* Old browsers */
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,rgba(234,218,184,1)), color-stop(50%,rgba(234,218,184,1)), color-stop(51%,rgba(204,187,151,1)), color-stop(100%,rgba(230,209,162,1))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(234,218,184,1) 0%,rgba(234,218,184,1) 50%,rgba(204,187,151,1) 51%,rgba(230,209,162,1) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#eadab8', endColorstr='#e6d1a2',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */
	-moz-border-radius: 10px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 10px;
	border-radius: 20px;
	border: 1px solid #8f897b;
	-moz-box-shadow:
	0px 1px 3px rgba(000,000,000,0.5),
	inset 0px 0px 5px rgba(161,142,016,0.6);
	-webkit-box-shadow:
	0px 1px 3px rgba(000,000,000,0.5),
	inset 0px 0px 5px rgba(161,142,016,0.6);
	box-shadow:
	0px 1px 3px rgba(000,000,000,0.5),
	inset 0px 0px 5px rgba(161,142,016,0.6);
	text-shadow:
	0px -1px 3px rgba(255,255,255,0.8),
	0px 1px 0px rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:right bottom;
    -moz-background-size:100% auto;
    background-size:100% auto;
	display:inline-block;
    cursor:pointer;
}

	font-size:100%;
    padding:1% 3%;
	    background: rgb(234,218,184); /* Old browsers */

    -webkit-border-radius: 10px;
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1px solid #8f897b;
    -moz-box-shadow:
    0px 1px 3px rgba(000,000,000,0.5),
    inset 0px 0px 5px rgba(161,142,016,0.6);

    0px 1px 3px rgba(000,000,000,0.5),

    background-size:100% auto;
    display:inline-block;
    cursor:pointer;

.tabb-21 {
	color:#ffffff;
	cursor:pointer;
	display:inline-block;
	padding:0;
	margin:0;
	text-align:center;
	width:50%;
	height:20px;
	float:left;
	text-shadow: 0 -1px 1px #222222,
	-1px 0 1px #222222,
	1px 0 1px #222222,
	0 1px 1px #222222;
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom,
		color-stop(0%,  rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)),
		color-stop(50%, rgba(245, 244, 245, 0.8)),
		color-stop(51%, rgba(237, 237, 237, 0.8)),
		color-stop(75%, rgba(237, 234, 234, 0.8)),
		color-stop(100%,rgba(219, 217, 222, 0.8)));
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,
		rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8),
		rgba(245, 244, 245, 0.8) 50%,
		rgba(237, 237, 237, 0.8) 51%,
		rgba(237, 234, 234, 0.8) 75%,
		rgba(219, 217, 222, 0.8));
    box-shadow:  inset 1px 1px 1px 1px
        rgba(180, 180, 180, 1);

	margin:0;
	font-size:1em;
	text-align:center;
			width:24.5%;
		float:left;

	-1px 0 1px #222222,
	1px 0 1px #222222,
	0 1px 1px #222222;

		color-stop(0%,  rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)),

		color-stop(51%, rgba(237, 237, 237, 0.8)),

		color-stop(100%,rgba(219, 217, 222, 0.8)));

<script type="text/javascript">
$(window).load(function() {
    $('.flexslider1').flexslider({
		animation: "slide",
		animationLoop: true,
		slideshowSpeed: 3500,
		direction: "vertical",
		animationDuration: 1000,
		animationSpeed: 900,
		smoothHeight: false,
		easing: "swing",
		reverse: false,
		itemWidth: 0,
		itemMargin: 0,
		minItems: 2,
		maxItems: 6,
		move: 1,
		pausePlay: false,
		pauseOnAction: true,
		pauseOnHover: true,
		touch: true,
		directionNav: false,
		controlNav: false,
		slideshow: true,
		startAT: 1,
		slideToStart: 1,
		start: function(){
			slideToStart: 1
		}
	});
	    $('.flexslider').flexslider({
        animation: "slide",
        animationLoop: true,
        slideshowSpeed: 3000,
		animationSpeed: 900,
        animationDuration: 1,
        easing: "swing",
        reverse: false,
        itemWidth: '80%',
        itemMargin: 0,
        minItems: 1,
        maxItems: 10,
        move: 1,
        pausePlay: false,
        pauseOnAction: false,
        pauseOnHover: false,
        touch: true,
        directionNav: false,
        controlNav: false,
        slideshow: true,
        startAT: 1,
        slideToStart: 1,
        start: function(){
        	slideToStart: 1
        }
    });
	
});
</script>

            <td width="17%"><a href="?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fquest_area.php"><img src="http://sp.pf-img-a.mbga.jp/12012090?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fimg%2Fspacer.png%3Fa%3D37" width="100%" /></a></td>
            <td width="17%"><a href="?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fraid_boss_ctrl.php"><img src="http://sp.pf-img-a.mbga.jp/12012090?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fimg%2Fspacer.png%3Fa%3D37" width="100%" /></a></td>
            <td width="17%"><a href="?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fgacha_select.php"><img src="http://sp.pf-img-a.mbga.jp/12012090?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fimg%2Fspacer.png%3Fa%3D37" width="100%" /></a></td>
            <td width="17%"><img src="http://sp.pf-img-a.mbga.jp/12012090?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fimg%2Fspacer.png%3Fa%3D37" width="100%" id="menubtn2" /></td>
            <td><img src="http://sp.pf-img-a.mbga.jp/12012090?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmadoka2.sp.nextory.co.jp%2Fimg%2Fspacer.png%3Fa%3D37" width="100%" /></td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</div>
</td></tr></table>
<script type="text/javascript">
$("#menubtn2").click(function(){
$("#menu2").toggle();
});
</script>
